title: Do you guys think Kennen is alright at the moment?
body:
do you guys think kennen is alright at the moment?

any balance changes or visual updates?

replies.body:
He could definitely have a visual update, but like JasonWazza says, a lot of champs are in need of that.

I cant really comment too much on his power because he isn't picked enough to get an accurate reading (like how in science you need to repeat an experiment many many times to get an accurate result) 

from what i have seen of him he seems quite powerful but unlike vayne/lee he isn't causing problems atm, so i think he is fine.

>because he isn't picked enough to get an accurate reading

The problem is he is a niche pick (which is not understood by a lot of players.)

ADC kennen is basically to take an ADC with a proper in built stun and high utility (not normally what you want from your ADC)

AP kennen is for AoE damage, the problem being other picks do it better (viktor being the main one for this)

sure but he still isn't picked enough for people to accurately gauge his power, take vayne for example, she is in every 3rd game and has been for the entire year, so the whole community has a good idea of how strong she is and what she can do, she doesnt surprise anyone anymore, kennen doesn't have that, it doesnt matter why he isn't picked often and you can give any reason you want, but the fact is that he is picked significantly less than vayne/lee etc and so people are less familiar with him.

maybe a visual update, but that is true of a lot of champs.

Honestly Kennen himself is in a fine position, slightly under-picked but that is mostly because of the meta.
